Class LandmarksImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_landmarks.LandmarksImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Landmarks

    public class LandmarksImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements Landmarks
    LandmarksImp is the main class to calculate and work with landmarks.

    1.0

        Retrieves all the orderings between landmarks in the LG.

        getOrderings in interface Landmarks
        Parameters:
        type - Type of orderings to return (NECESSARY_ORDERINGS, REASONABLE_ORDERINGS or ALL_ORDERINGS)
        onlyGoals - If true, return only orderings that affect the task goals; otherwise, return all the orederings
